name: Spelunker
overview: Only the bravest spelunker can hope to find the burried treasure! Priceless treasures await you in a chamber deep within the earth. Between you and the treasure are traps and barriers, restless ghosts of spelunkers who lost their way, and countless other dangers. Your mission is to explore the caves and find the keys that will unlock the doors leading to the next passages. There is a tale of a legendary pyramid, in the deepest part of the cave, filled with riches beyond your wildest dreams...
